name: Pots of Greed!
description:
Jump, smash, and steal your way to victory in this fast-paced  game of coin collecting! Smash the earth to break out its golden treasures! Bash up to 4 friends to break the gold out of them, too! Become the ULTIMATE COIN HOARDER!

In...

POTS OF GREED COLLECT-O-THON!!!!

CONTROLS - Up to 4 players

Currently only controller input is supported.

A-Jump

X- Smash

LEFT STICK - Move Left and Right in game

D-PAD - Move Up and Down in menus
